banner.title: International Tech Gateways
banner.description: Empowering Gujranwala’s Transition into a Global Tech Hub.

mainContent.description: GBA is leading the digital transformation of Gujranwala by fostering innovation, technological collaboration, and global connectivity within the region’s IT ecosystem. Through strategic partnerships with leading technology forums, innovation platforms, and academic institutions, the Alliance is building a strong foundation for the city’s digital economy and enhancing the global competitiveness of its technology sector. Through the establishment of International Tech Gateways, GBA has created a transformative network that connects local IT companies with opportunities for international collaboration, innovation, and market expansion. These gateways support startups and established firms in accessing cross-border ventures, capacity-building initiatives, and technology exchange projects. With active linkages across Central Asia, the Middle East, Europe, and East Asia, GBA continues to facilitate joint ventures, training programs, and digital partnerships that drive skill development, innovation, and commercial growth - positioning Gujranwala as a rising player in Pakistan’s IT and technology export landscape.

shortServices.title: Global Tech Connectivity
shortServices.description: Linking local IT companies with international innovation ecosystems

shortServices.title: International Collaborations
shortServices.description: Enabling joint ventures, technology exchange, and global project partnerships

shortServices.title: Digital Skill Advancement
shortServices.description: Providing training and capacity-building for a future-ready tech workforce

shortServices.title: Innovation & Market Expansion
shortServices.description: Opening pathways for startups and firms to enter new digital markets worldwide
